name: brick production facility construction | brick production facility | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11602/documentation

The dataset represents the construction of the brick production facility in GLO in the period 1954-2029. This GLO dataset is extrapolated from the Quebec dataset. ;;The dataset represents the construction of the brick production facility. ;Specific data for the annual production and estimations for the land use were collected from the only producer of brick (made from shale) in Québec, for the year 2012. ;The average yearly production volume of brick shale is 66'957 t and the lifetime of the site is estimated to75 years, ;Total land occupation: 344'3263 m²; about 12'000 m² building hall, 5'000 m² paved roads, 25'000 m² vegetation and the balance is considered as industrial area. ;ssumed weight of machines taken from clay pit construction ecoinvent (v3) dataset: 2'000t and service life estimated to 50 years.

This activity start from the construction of the facility.

The activity ends with the dismantling of the site and the end-of-life of the construction materials.
The dataset includes the land-use, building hall, the internal parkings and streets and the industrial machine (rock crusher). The disposal of the buildings and machinery is taken into account in the infrastructure datasets.

This dataset doesn't include the operation of the brick production facility.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Facility built in 1954 with a lifetime of 75 years. The complete lifetime is considered in the dataset
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Extrapolated from the Quebec dataset. Estimation for the machinery is based on an existing european dataset. Uncertainty adjusted accordingly
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The data of the infrastructure corresponds to the current technology
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription:
GLO dataset extrapolated from Quebec dataset. 
Land use data are based on the only Québec brick producer. Other information is rough estimation. This dataset has been copied and modified from ''clay pit construction'' dataset covering the geography GLO (ecoinvent v3.0). The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Estimations from data provider and similar processes.

exchanges.description: Estimated value. It is assumed that the surface related to the brick production represent 30% of the entire site including brick production facility and clay pit (excluded).

EcoSpold01Location=RER
Calculated value. Extrapolated from industrial machine used in clay pit construction dataset. It is assumed that machinery lifetime is 50 years.
